import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; import { addsalontoDB } from "../../actions/salonAction"; export class signup extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.saveSalon = this.saveSalon.bind(this); } saveSalon(event) { console.log("ee", this.state); this.props.addsalon(this.state); event.preventDefault(); } render() { return (

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({}); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ addsalon: (salon) => dispatch(addsalontoDB(salon)), }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(signup);
